title: ICE: no type for node 443: expr FullRange (id=443) in fcx 0x53f4d60

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Sample code:

``` rust
fn foo(s: &str) {
    let _ = s.to_ascii_upper()[];
}

fn main() {
}
```

ICE:

```
error: internal compiler error: no type for node 443: expr FullRange (id=443) in fcx 0x53f4d60
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', F:\Dokumente\Coding\rust\rust-lang\src\libsyntax\diagnostic.rs:182
```
